sentences.en: Don't be lulled into thinking your privacy settings are foolproof.
sentences.cn: 不要相信你的隐私设置是十分安全的.

sentences.cn: 他试图发明一种安全得连小孩子都可以用的消灭白蚁的方法.

sentences.en: It has to be foolproof when he comes home.
sentences.cn: 他回家的时候,一定要绝对保险.

sentences.cn: 愚蠢是不可避免的,因为愚蠢太富有创造力了.

sentences.en: Such measures aren't foolproof, of course.
sentences.cn: 当然,采取这种措施也不是万无一失的.

sentences.cn: 这个系统并非是万无一失。

sentences.en: The system is pretty well foolproof.

sentences.en: This program allows you to shrink a picture aa foolproof way.
sentences.cn: 本程序能通过傻瓜式的操作来缩小照片.

sentences.en: This recipe is foolproof—it works every time.
sentences.cn: 这个食谱绝对管用，每次都万无一失。

sentences.en: We're trying to work out a way to make the system foolproof.
sentences.cn: 我们正努力想办法使这个系统简单易操作.

trans.tran_cn: （方法、计划、系统等设计得）万无一失的，肯定成功的
trans.tran_en: Something such as a plan or a machine that is foolproof is so well designed, easy to understand, or easy to use that it cannot go wrong or be used wrongly
